actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide the right of persons lawfully assembled to participate in nondenominational prayer.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the U.S. Constitution shall abridge the right of persons lawfully assembled, in any public building, vessel, aircraft, spacecraft, or facility, which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds, to participate in nondenominational prayer.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide the right of persons lawfully assembled to participate in nondenominational prayer.
